children: Overview of the metabolic systems that maintain calcium homeostasis. Parathyroid hormone (PTH) stimulates increased 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D [1,25(OH)
D] synthesis by the kidneys, and 1,25(OH)
D causes feedback suppression of PTH production.

footnotes: D = 1,25-dihydroxyvitamin D (calcitriol); PTH = parathyroid hormone; â†‘ = increased.
